response.overview: When an EPA representative is murdered in a small Appalachian community, EPA undercover agent Jack Taggart is sent in—posing as a handyman working with a Christian relief agency—to determine what happened.
response.tagline: Beneath a land of wealth and beauty hides a secret that could kill millions. Undercover has never run so deep.
response.title: Fire Down Below

cast.name: Mary Ann Schmidt
cast.character: Wheel of Fortune Girl in Casino
